ShortDescription.Value: Multiplayer mod for City Skylines II

Publish.LongDescription:
## MultiSkyLinesII Bring your cities together with a real-time multiplayer resource trading experience.
### Current status - Prototype / Work in progress - Features are evolving quickly - Multiplayer sessions may still have bugs
### Main features - Host / Client multiplayer mode - Live player HUD (stats, contracts, debug) - Contract system for Electricity, Water, and Sewage - Per-tick settlements and synchronized contract events
### Quick start 1. Open the mod settings and configure Host or Client mode. 2. Keep port `25565` open and reachable for remote clients. 3. Start or join a city session. 4. Press `F8` in-game to open/close the multiplayer HUD.
### Notes - This mod is not considered stable yet. - For remote play, use the host public/local IP (not localhost). - If anything desyncs, check the HUD Debug tab logs first.
